mapper.update: update userchat set chat_userA = #{chatUsera,jdbcType=INTEGER}, chat_userB = #{chatUserb,jdbcType=INTEGER}, statr_time = #{statrTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, userA_look = #{useraLook,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userB_look = #{userbLook,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where userchat_id = #{userchatId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select userchat_id, chat_userA, chat_userB, statr_time, userA_look, userB_look from userchat
